title: Patch Notes
content: during his game of lanceboard with Mol. Fixed a Reconstituted Duellist's line getting cut off prematurely. He really, really wanted you to hear him finish saying 'come to my inner chambers'. Fixed one of the Winged Horrors at Moonrise Towers getting its line cut off prematurely. Slowed down your head movement when you turn to look at Jaheira in the dialogue with her and Isobel at Last Light.
